tool_description: Add a custom text stamp or watermark to each pages of your PDF files.
name: PDFier - PDF Stamping
title: PDFier - PDF Stamping

api_list.name: Watermark / Stamp a PDF file by its URL
api_list.description: Watermark / Stamp each page of a PDF with a text and returns the URL of the PDF stamped
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://pdfier-pdf-stamping.p.rapidapi.com/rapidapi_stamp"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pdfier-pdf-stamping.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://pdfier-pdf-stamping.p.rapidapi.com/rapidapi_stamp"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "pdfier-pdf-stamping.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
